name: Penumbral Obscuration
text:
Target a friendly unit.

Affected models ignore movement penalties for rough terrain. While within an area of rough terrain affected models gain +2 DEF and Stealth. A model with Stealth cannot be targeted by attacks made by models more than 8" away.

Penumbral Obscuration expires at the end of the Pulse round.
changes: Replace "completely within" with "within". Now grants +2 DEF in addition to Stealth.
